data.name: Yonder - Accessory Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
Glam up your character with this free accessory pack. Who doesn't like to accessorise?!

This free pack contains:
  • Gasmask
  • Viking helmet
  • Tiara
  • Beret
  • Fairy wings
  • Lovely glasses

To recieve your items...

After installing the DLC, find 'Maggie' in any town/village. Simply talk to her to recieve your items!
data.about_the_game:
Glam up your character with this free accessory pack. Who doesn't like to accessorise?!

This free pack contains:
  • Gasmask
  • Viking helmet
  • Tiara
  • Beret
  • Fairy wings
  • Lovely glasses

To recieve your items...

After installing the DLC, find 'Maggie' in any town/village. Simply talk to her to recieve your items!
data.short_description: Glam up your character with this free accessory pack. Who doesn't like to accessorise?! Includes 6x items to customise your character.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S @ 2.5 GHZ or AMD FX-4320 @ 4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
